vsParam:
Ah, [px]!
Sorry, I have something to ask...

Where can I buy some painting supplies?
I can't find any in the campus shop...

Yeah... But, Lydie.
You want to buy painting supplies. Does it mean...

Yes. I haven't painted for a long time.
I want to paint something.

I see... Um, [px],
why don't we help Lydie prepare some painting supplies?

This will free Lydie up and
we can see her painting sooner.
I am really looking forward to Lydie's painting!

Ha ha ha, thank you so much
for helping me!

Ha ha ha, please don't get your hopes too high...
Anyway, thank you so much for helping me!

Wow... These painting supplies are so beautiful!
I've never seen such fancy painting supplies!

Oh, really?
I'm glad you like them!

Lydie, Lydie!
Hee hee, now the painting supplies are in place...

That's right! Paint a picture!
I can be your model!

Wow, you posed for Lydie already...
Sorel, can you please calm down a little?

It's done!
Sorel, you can feel free to move now!

Phew, phew...
This pose is rather tiring...

Ha ha ha, thank you...
Let's appreciate Lydie's work.

What do you think?
I think it's good...

Y-yeah!
This painting perfectly reflects my beauty!

Yeah, yeah!
The hair in the painting feels like Sorel's real hair!
Ho ho. You are really a good painter, Lydie.

Ah... Really?
Wonderful! I barely receive compliments on my painting!

Hee hee, I am so happy!
Alright~ I am in a good mood, I'll paint more!

Um...
Looks like we better tell her the truth...

No, it's hard to say...
It's great as long as she's happy, right?

Alright. Plus, she was so devoted when painting it.
Here, Sorel.

OK, I'll take it.
Ho ho, I'll put it up in my room for decoration.
